page.title: 08TOURISM IN THE NORTH TYNE
page.content: This is a very scattered moorland area, a few farmhouses and some private housing. The B6320 main road from Hexham bears many{travellers}by car, bus, cycle and walking,most visiting the largest manmade reservoir in Europe at Kielder.{Accommodation } can be obtained from the new bungalow overlooking Bellingham, Fell View 8461,bed and breakfast with ample car parking. Walks over the fells are pleasant on fine day, near to B6320 and Pennine Way. At Lea Hall farm 8680 bed and breakfast with evening meal can be provided, near to North Tyne river and some good walking on public footpaths. Anton Hill bungalow 8580 a {furnished holiday let}in summer months. Some careful{camping}may sometimes be allowed on contacting the farmers.
